Package frc.sorutil.motor

Class MotorConfiguration

java.lang.Object
frc.sorutil.motor.MotorConfiguration
public class MotorConfiguration extends Object
Class that holds meta configuration values for all types of motor controllers. Using options not supported by a motor controller will result in an error.

Note that all PID control is currently done in the native units of the motor controller, and will require adjusting from values calculated. This does not apply to soft PID controllers, which are implemented with the WPILib values.
